module Graphics.Rendering.OpenGL.Raw.NV.MultisampleFilterHint (
   -- * Tokens
   gl_MULTISAMPLE_FILTER_HINT
) where

import Graphics.Rendering.OpenGL.Raw.Core32

gl_MULTISAMPLE_FILTER_HINT :: GLenum
gl_MULTISAMPLE_FILTER_HINT = 0x8534
